children.name: visible

parameters.name: visible `Boolean`
parameters.description: A flag indicating if the element should be visible.

children.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the element.

children.name: removeAt

parameters.name: index `Number`
parameters.description: The index at which the element currently resides.

children.description: Removes the child element at the specified position.

children.name: remove
children.description: Removes the specified element from the group.

children.name: opacity

parameters.name: opacity `Number`
parameters.description: The group opacity. Ranges from 0 (completely transparent) to 1 (completely opaque).

children.description: Gets or sets the group opacity.Inherited from [Element.opacity](element#methods-opacity)The opacity of any child groups and elements will be multiplied by this value.

children.name: insert

parameters.name: position `Number`
parameters.description: The position to insert the element at. Existing children beyond this position will be shifted right.

children.description: Inserts an element at the specified position.

children.name: clippedBBox
children.description: Returns the bounding box of the element with clipping and transformations applied.Inherited from [Element.clippedBBox](element#methods-clippedBBox)

children.name: clip
children.description: Gets or sets the group clipping path.Inherited from [Element.clip](element#methods-clip)

children.name: clear
children.description: Removes all child elements from the group.

children.name: append

parameters.name: element `kendo.drawing.Element`
parameters.description: The element to append. Multiple parameters are accepted.

children.description: Appends the specified element as a last child of the group.

children.name: visible
children.description: A flag, indicating if the group and its children are visible.Inherited from [Element.visible](element#configuration-visible)

children.name: transform
children.description: The transformation to apply to this group and its children.Inherited from [Element.transform](element#configuration-transform)

children.name: pdf
children.description: Page options to apply during PDF export.

children.name: opacity
children.description: The group opacity.Inherited from [Element.opacity](element#configuration-opacity)The opacity of any child groups and elements will be multiplied by this value.
